---
title: "Hello Arrow Exercises"
execute:

editor: source

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(arrow)
library(dplyr)
```
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi <- open_dataset(here::here("data/nyc-taxi"))
```
:::






::: {#exercise-hello-nyc-taxi .callout-tip}
## First dplyr pipeline with Arrow

::: panel-tabset
## Problems

1.  Calculate the longest trip distance for every month in 2019

2.  How long did this query take to run?

## Solution 1

Longest trip distance for every month in 2019:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarize(longest_trip = max(trip_distance, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  arrange(month) |> 
  collect()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 12 × 2
   month longest_trip
   <int>        <dbl>
 1     1         832.
 2     2         702.
 3     3         237.
 4     4         831.
 5     5         401.
 6     6       45977.
 7     7         312.
 8     8         602.
 9     9         604.
10    10         308.
11    11         701.
12    12       19130.
```
:::
:::


## Solution 2

Compute time:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tictoc)

tic()
nyc_taxi |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarize(longest_trip = max(trip_distance, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  arrange(month) |> 
  collect()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 12 × 2
   month longest_trip
   <int>        <dbl>
 1     1         832.
 2     2         702.
 3     3         237.
 4     4         831.
 5     5         401.
 6     6       45977.
 7     7         312.
 8     8         602.
 9     9         604.
10    10         308.
11    11         701.
12    12       19130.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
toc()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
0.461 sec elapsed
```
:::
:::


or 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nyc_taxi |> 
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarize(longest_trip = max(trip_distance, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  arrange(month) |> 
  collect() |> 
  system.time()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   user  system elapsed 
  3.887   0.225   0.435 
```
:::
:::


:::
:::
